uvi.description:
misc/libmasm/module: Fix two use after free in ibmasm_init_one

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.276 by commit 29ba8e2ba89ee2862a26d91204dd5fe77ceee25a. For more details please see the references link.
